name: Flying Soul
description:
Fun and challenging flying game as you've never seen before!Flying soul is a Flying game with a totally different proposal. The main target is to be Fun and wild!
The objective is not to kill enemies or do quests, but to go through the targets using a strategy to finish the level in time. It may seems simple at first, but as you move to new levels, things get complicated and you will need to prove your skills, Be fast and accurate with your Spaceship while doing wild moves to win the challenges!
The targets are not the same all the time, new challenges will be find and more complex kind of behaviors will be explored.

To win, you and your Spaceship will have to be only one soul!Early Access Warning!This game is in early access and may have bugs and balancing problems. Be aware of that.
Race Mode is just a demonstration for now.
If you find bugs or want to suggest improvements let us know through the Community Hub!

Thank you!
